pages.text: wa-asirru qawlakum awi ij'haru bihi innahu ʿalimun bidhati l-suduri
ala yaʿlamu man khalaqa wahuwa l-latifu l-khabiru
huwa alladhi jaʿala lakumu l-arda dhalulan fa-im'shu fi manakibiha wakulu min riz'qihi wa-ilayhi l-nushuru
a-amintum man fi l-samai an yakhsifa bikumu l-arda fa-idha hiya tamuru
am amintum man fi l-samai an yur'sila ʿalaykum hasiban fasataʿlamuna kayfa nadhiri
walaqad kadhaba alladhina min qablihim fakayfa kana nakiri
awalam yaraw ila l-tayri fawqahum saffatin wayaqbid'na ma yum'sikuhunna illa l-rahmanu innahu bikulli shayin basirun
amman hadha alladhi huwa jundun lakum yansurukum min duni l-rahmani ini l-kafiruna illa fi ghururin
amman hadha alladhi yarzuqukum in amsaka riz'qahu bal lajju fi ʿutuwwin wanufurin
afaman yamshi mukibban ʿala wajhihi ahda amman yamshi sawiyyan ʿala siratin mus'taqimin
qul huwa alladhi ansha-akum wajaʿala lakumu l-samʿa wal-absara wal-afidata qalilan ma tashkuruna
qul huwa alladhi dhara-akum fi l-ardi wa-ilayhi tuh'sharuna
wayaquluna mata hadha l-waʿdu in kuntum sadiqina
qul innama l-ʿil'mu ʿinda l-lahi wa-innama ana nadhirun mubinun
